navbar.Unique-Team: Unique Team of Resources Management and Optimization Experts and passionate Software Developers
navbar.Mexican: Mexican Company with the following experience since 2006: Resource Optimization Consultancy and Configuration Support Services IT Software Solutions Development
navbar.Development-of: Development of business rules for resource management
navbar.Implement-Aircraft: Implement Aircraft and Crew Tracking Systems and Optimizers
navbar.Innovation-and: Innovation and Development of new systems
navbar.Development: Development of Integrations / Interfaces for computer systems
navbar.descripcion: We invite you to participate in the 2nd Business Forum of the Baj√¨o A.C Aerospace Cluster, follow the conferences, panels, and meetups of the event on our platform and social networks.
navbar.descripcion2: 14 years streamlining global mobility through a passionate software developers team. Congratulations TEAM Optimen!
navbar.Hannover-Messe_P: Optimen family present at 'Industrial Transformation Mexico, Hannover Messe HANNOVER MESSE is the most important international platform and hot spot for industrial transformation' - with excellent innovations or unusual products.
navbar.Ana-Avatar-XPrice_P: Optimen teamed up with Inbiodroid are working together on ANA Avatar XPRIZE challenge that aims to create an Avatar system that can transport human presence to a remote location in real time.
navbar.innovation-Hub_P: Optimen inaugurated its innovation center, a space focus on competencies development for the aeronautical sector.
navbar.AWS-Mentefactura-GTO-Challenge_P: Hackathon organized by the alliance between AWS, Optimen, Educafin, IdeaGTO, SEG and GAP with the purpose that students, Guanajuato talent, will execute innovative projects aimed at improving airport services.
navbar.What-is-Optimen?_P: Optimen is a Mexican Software Development company that provides resources management and optimization services to different industries. The company was designated and approved as an International Service Contractor for Jeppesen and Boeing.
navbar.Mission_P: Support and facilitate Air Lines around the world to maintain reliable and sustainable operations through Technology, Innovation and living our Values.
navbar.Vision_P: To be the First option in Software, Technology and Innovation services for the global Airlines in the area of Aeronautical operational control.
navbar.Our-Customers_P: Through our capabilities, the services we provide, and our commitment, we implement projects resulting in satisfied clients and success stories.
navbar.Our-Project-Experience_P: Through our experience as certified Jeppesen/Boeing consultants, we contribute to the support of the configuration and customization of state-of-the-art optimization software for several key airlines in the aeronautical sector at an international level.
